body_html:
With the tensorflow 1.0 onward versions there is tf.layers api where I can mention trainable=False
E.g tf.layers.Dense(10, trainable=False).
My query is how to freeze the layers like basicLSTMcell or BidirectionalLSTM, i.e. for layer functions under tf.nn?
body_text:
With the tensorflow 1.0 onward versions there is tf.layers api where I can mention trainable=False
E.g tf.layers.Dense(10, trainable=False).
My query is how to freeze the layers like basicLSTMcell or BidirectionalLSTM, i.e. for layer functions under tf.nn?
body:
With the tensorflow 1.0 onward versions there is tf.layers api where I can mention trainable=False
E.g tf.layers.Dense(10, trainable=False). 
My query is how to freeze the layers like basicLSTMcell or BidirectionalLSTM, i.e. for layer functions under tf.nn?
